title: Several improvements
message:
Several improvements

- Only add ships to map which are not too old (<20 minutes)]
- Get string literals from resources
- Unregister usbReceiver in ShowMapFragment
- Decrease default 'ship scale factor' from 8 to 5
- Implemented Maximum age of Ships (and traces) in settings

title: Prepare for release
message: Prepare for release

title: Detect plug in USB device while application is running
message:
Detect plug in USB device while application is running

Currently it is not supported to use a newly plugged in  USB device
while the application is running already.
Detect this event, show warning popup and close application.

title: Bugfix ShowMapFragment.ShowMapFragmentPermissionsDispatcher
message:
Bugfix ShowMapFragment.ShowMapFragmentPermissionsDispatcher

Can only perform permission actions when Fragment is added to activity

title: Refactored SocketIO client logic
message:
Refactored SocketIO client logic

- Use -one- SocketIO connection
- Don't send server cached messages on CONNECT but on REQUEST
- Perform all SocketIO actions in SocketIoClient.class

title: Prepare for release
message: Prepare for release

title: Bugfix nullpointer ShowMapFragment.setupNmeaClientService / Cache offline received NMEA messages
message:
Bugfix nullpointer ShowMapFragment.setupNmeaClientService / Cache offline received NMEA messages

Bugfix ShowMapFragment.setupNmeaClientService:
  Only get/use Activity when the Fragment isAdded.

When receiving NMEA messages while not connected to network,
cache these messages in a file at the client.
Connection to network is checked only once when starting application.
When restarting application while connected to Network,
these messages will be send to the backend (SocketIO).
Sending is only done when the Use setting allows this.

title: Prepare for release
message:
Prepare for release

Major version: Sharing NMEA with peers is new functionality

title: Implementation - Sharing and receiving NMEA data with/from peers
message:
Implementation - Sharing and receiving NMEA data with/from peers

- Implemented backend using SocketIO
- Sign message to backend
- Make android.hardware.usb.host optional again
  Devices without RTL-SDR can still receive Ships from peers
- Added peers layers to map (Ships and Traces)
- Make it possible to switch off sharing NMEA data (via Settings)
- Allow to run application without attached RTL-SDR device (receive data from peers)

Select from multiple devices

- Match all connected USB devices against the supported devices,

- Implemented RtlSdrDevice which holds a UsbDevice
- Load native library in a try-catch block, on error report to user
- Make android.hardware.usb.host required

title: Bugfix: Make registerReceiver / unregisterReceiver calls symmetrically
message:
Bugfix: Make registerReceiver / unregisterReceiver calls symmetrically

Solving issue:
IllegalArgumentException (@OpenDeviceActivity:onStop:163) {main}

Calling registerReceiver and unregisterReceiver symmetrically:
 - registerReceiver   from onStart and
 - unregisterReceiver from onStop

Don't check for (usbReceiver!=null):
  usbReceiver is a final instance variable -> always set.

title: Make it possible to use a custom 'own location icon' and custom scaling factor…
message:
Make it possible to use a custom 'own location icon' and custom scaling factor for ships / Different ship icons

- Let the user select how to display own location on the map:
   - Antenna
   - House
   - Yacht
   - Sailboat
   - Cargo
- Let the user select how to scale ships in the map
- Default reduced the size of the ships
- Added new ship icons / differentiate between ships

title: Implemented 64 bits warning
message:
Implemented 64 bits warning

SIGSEGV detected in native (JNI) code.
No way to report this in a proper way back to the user.
The app will crash. So better to warn in advance.

Observed JNI backtraces:

#00 /data/app/net.videgro.ships-1/lib/arm64/libNativeRtlSdr.so (filter_run_buf+40)
#01 /data/app/net.videgro.ships-1/lib/arm64/libNativeRtlSdr.so (receiver_run+96)
#02 /data/app/net.videgro.ships-1/lib/arm64/libNativeRtlSdr.so (run_mem_decoder+136)
#03 /data/app/net.videgro.ships-1/lib/arm64/libNativeRtlSdr.so
#04 /system/lib64/libc.so (_ZL15__pthread_startPv+52)
#05 /system/lib64/libc.so (__start_thread+16)

title: Added a placeholder for the expected file: theme/default/style.css
message: Added a placeholder for the expected file: theme/default/style.css

title: Use FileProvider for sharing files
message:
Use FileProvider for sharing files

Resolving Android 7+ issue:
 android.os.FileUriExposedException: exposed beyond app through ClipData.Item.getUri()

More info:
 - http://stackoverflow.com/questions/38200282/android-os-fileuriexposedexception-file-storage-emulated-0-test-txt-exposed
 - https://inthecheesefactory.com/blog/how-to-share-access-to-file-with-fileprovider-on-android-nougat/en

title: Implemented Android6+ permissions model
message:
Implemented Android6+ permissions model

Ask runtime permissions for Location and Storage using the
third party library: PermissionsDispatcher

More information: https://hotchemi.github.io/PermissionsDispatcher/

title: Repeat AIS messages to third party AIS plotter (like OpenCPN)
message:
Repeat AIS messages to third party AIS plotter (like OpenCPN)

- Copy AIS messages to deliver it to third party AIS plotter
- Added settings to change UDP port
- Internally always use UDP 127.0.0.1:10109
  to send messages from JNI to Java

title: HttpCacheTileServer: Changed storage directory
message:
HttpCacheTileServer: Changed storage directory

- Use as default storage directory:
  context.getExternalFilesDir() instead of Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory()
- Android SDK >18 does not need need permission to store files in this directory
- Use as fallback: context.getCacheDir()

More info:
https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/data/data-storage.html

message:
Webview - Use a local copy of OpenStreetMap / Prefetch tiles

- Downloaded OpenStreetMap files to assets folder
  Including JavaScript, style sheet, images and JQuery.
- Removed JavaScript functions and global vars from index.html
  and moved to ships.js
- Created functions calculateAndPrefetchTileUrl and calculateTilePath
- Function calculateAndPrefetchTileUrl makes it possible to prefetch tiles.
- Bugfix in ships.js: autoZoom working when no data in shipVectors

title: HttpCachingTileServer - FIFO / Statistics / Bugfix
message:
HttpCachingTileServer - FIFO / Statistics / Bugfix

- Use for long number a long datatype instead of int
- Implemented FIFO to remove oldest files when maximum disk usage is hit
- Keep track of some statistics: hitCount, networkCount, requestCount and notFoundCount.

message: Settings - Implemented preference: maximum disk usage for map cache

title: Replaced own implementation of ImagePopup with AlertDialog
message:
Replaced own implementation of ImagePopup with AlertDialog

- Removed own implementation
- In Utils-class changed method showPopup so it will create an AlertDialog
  with automatic dismiss functionality.
- New ImagePopupListener interface
- Changed calling classes so it will refer to the new ImagePopupListener interface
  and call Utils.showPopup without auto dismiss set.

title: Android Support v4 - Removed dependency in own code / updated lib
message:
Android Support v4 - Removed dependency in own code / updated lib

- Replaced included android-support-v4.jar with latest from Android SDK
- Since Ships has minimal SDK version 16 (which is > 11) there is no need
  to use the Android Support v4 library.
  Replaced 'FragmentActivity' with 'Activity' and
  'NotificationCompat.Builder' with 'Notification.Builder'.
- The used Google Play services depends on this lib however.
  So it can't be removed completly from the project.

title: Refactored / Robustness (FragmentUtils/Calibrate)
message:
Refactored / Robustness (FragmentUtils/Calibrate)

- Moved shared code to create open device intent to separate function.
  - Before creating the intent, test whether the fragment is added to its view.
- Let FragmentUtils.startReceivingAisFromAntenna, changeRtlSdrPpm and stopReceivingAisFromAntenna
  return a success value.
- Let ShowMapFragment/CalibrateFragment use the return value of FragmentUtils.startReceivingAisFromAntenna/changeRtlSdrPpm
- Let CalibrateTask use the return value of CalibrateFragment.onTryPpm
- Bugfix: The thorough calibrating button must start a THOROUGH scan
